member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule
member.summary: The DependencyInitializationModule class prepares the dependencies for the services and components supporting the activity streams feature set of the Social platform.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.ConfigureContainer(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.ServiceConfigurationContext)
member.summary: Prepares dependencies for the Social activity streams services, and registers them with the site's IoC system.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Initialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the initialization procedure for this module.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Uninitialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the teardown procedure for this module.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.ConfigureActivityStreamsDependencies(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.ServiceConfigurationContext)
member.summary: Registers dependencies for the Social activity streams services with the site's IoC system.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateSubscriptionService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the ISubscriptionService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Subscription service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateActivityService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IActivityService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Activity service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateFeedService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IFeedService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Feed service intended to support the site

member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.EpiSiteActivityStreamsFactory
member.summary: Returns an ActivityStreamsFactory with for an Episerver site that leverages EpiServer's logging infrastructure

member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.ActivityStreams.Site.EpiLogger
member.summary: This class corresponds to a logger that uses the Episerver logging infrastructure for logging messages.

member.summary: Logs a critical message to the underlying log.

member.summary: Logs a debug message to the underlying log.
